ModMetaData.name: Coordinate Readout (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Noquiem
ModMetaData.description:
This is a continued version of [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2605167683]Coordinate Readout[/url] by Noquiem.
This mod simply adds a coordinate readout to the screen so that the player can locate items on the map if they know the coordinates.
This can be a very useful troubleshooting tool if the error log tells you that something is happening at a certain location, and you need to find where that is located.
The continued version lets the player scale the text size, adjust the color and opacity, and gives a bit more freedom in placing the readout.
https://github.com/VitaKaninen/Coordinate-Readout-Continued
